Title: Requires each certificate of death to also be filed with the board of elections for the county in which the registrar is appointed
Summary: Requires each certificate of death to also be filed with the board of elections for the county in which the registrar is appointed.
LawCode: Amd ยง4140, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring each certificate of death to also be filed with the board of elections for the county in which the registrar is appointed
